article_title: Trump plays starring role in NRA leadership’s ‘parade of paranoia’
article_text: Tom Eblen is a columnist for the Lexington Herald-Leader who writes about life, people and issues in Lexington and Kentucky. A Lexington native, Eblen was the Herald-Leader's managing editor from 1998 to 2008.

article_metadata.title: Trump plays starring role in NRA leadership’s ‘parade of paranoia’ | Lexington Herald-Leader

og.description: Donald Trump brought his feel-good fascism back to Louisville on Friday to receive an enthusiastic endorsement from the National Rifle Association and speak to its national convention.
og.title: Trump plays starring role in NRA leadership’s ‘parade of paranoia’
